title: Setup folder structure (input/tools/output)
body: Create base folders: input/, tools/, output/, logs/, configs/, tests/, .vscode/, .husky/, .github/.

title: Pin Node version with .nvmrc (v20.10.0)
body: Add .nvmrc with v20.10.0 and use nvm for reproducible runtime.

title: Mark package as private + ESM only
body: Set package.json { "type": "module", "private": true } to lock ESM and prevent accidental publish.

title: VS Code workspace configuration
body: Add .vscode/settings.json, extensions.json, tasks.json to streamline builds and validation.

title: Husky pre-commit hook (lint, fixtures, validator)
body: Hook runs: lint-staged, npm run deemind:test, node tools/validator.js; fail on errors.

title: Minimal CI workflow (build demo + fixtures)
body: Add .github/workflows/build.yml to run npm ci, build demo, run fixtures on push/PR.

title: Implement hybrid parser with timeout + size caps + quarantine
body: Parse HTML via Cheerio; 5s timeout; skip files > settings.maxInputFileBytes; copy failures to input/_failed; record in conversion-report.json.

title: Generate conflict summary + layout map
body: Write logs/conflict-summary.md and logs/layout-map.json for per-page component order and basic conflicts.

title: Semantic mapper with mappings.json + client overrides + --i18n
body: Replace placeholders from configs/mappings.json and configs/<client>/mappings.json; optional i18n wraps titles.

title: Sanitize mode to strip inline handlers + http scripts
body: --sanitize removes on* attributes and insecure http script tags during mapping.

title: Adapter with path guards, asset copy, unchanged lock
body: Ensure writes stay under output/<theme>; copy assets/ skipping symlinks and oversize; support --lock-unchanged.

title: Asset URL normalizer (rewrite relative src/href to assets/normalized)
body: Scan page HTML and copy referenced files into assets/normalized; rewrite refs to theme_asset path.

title: Core validator with levels and required pages
body: Critical vs warning; read configs/routes.json to warn on required page missing; twig lint for extends/content block.

title: Extended validator: encoding, handlers, insecure scripts, cycles, assets, budgets, i18n, samples, svg, collisions
body: Fail on inline handlers/http scripts/assets 404; detect cycles; budgets (warn/error via settings); i18n gaps; sample strings; unsafe SVG; case-insensitive partial collisions.

title: Manifest generation with content checksum + input checksum
body: Move generateBuildManifest into validator; hash file contents; add input folder checksum; include page order and warnings count.

title: Conversion and per-page reports
body: Write output/<theme>/conversion-report.json and output/<theme>/reports/pages/*.json; include written/skipped/failed and components.

title: Settings switches (requireI18n, rawAllowlist, failOnBudget, size caps)
body: configs/settings.json adds requireI18n, rawAllowlist, failOnBudget, maxInputFileBytes, maxAssetFileBytes, sanitizeByDefault.

title: Routes map (configs/routes.json)
body: List required pages (e.g., index.twig, product.twig, category.twig, search.twig) for validator checks.

title: Baseline compare utility + component usage report
body: Scan baseline/raed/partials or configs/standard-components.json; produce reports/component-usage.json labeled standard/custom.

title: Partialization pass (flagged) + prune tool
body: --partialize promotes components used on â‰¥2 pages; replace inline by includes; prune unused with factory:prune.

title: Hybrid parser runner: template hints + CSS/JS maps
body: Template hints (hero/product/footer/header), CSS map via PostCSS (inline styles), inline JS extraction saved to assets/js.

title: Factory build all script (build-all.js)
body: Add npm run factory:build:all to iterate input/ and build each theme.

title: Labels and milestones in GitHub
body: Create labels: core, config, docs, automation, qa, ai. Create milestones: Week 1/2/3 per plan.

title: Project board setup (To Do/In Progress/Review/Done)
body: Create a GitHub Projects board and add all issues; keep updated daily.

title: Regression test (double-run diff of pages/layout)
body: Add script to rebuild twice and diff pages/**/*.twig and layout/**/*.twig ignoring timestamps.

title: Stress test (50+ HTML files mock)
body: Measure build time and memory; ensure timeouts and caps protect parser.

title: Schema failure test (broken manifest)
body: Intentionally write invalid manifest and verify extended validator errors.

title: Preview generator (optional)
body: Generate a simple local preview HTML to browse output/<theme>/pages/ for smoke visual checks.

title: AI usage note (VS Code assistant only â€” no runtime)
body: Add docs/ai.md stating guidelines for using GPT Codex/Copilot in refactor/tests only; no runtime AI dependencies.

title: Docs snapshot: quickstart + architecture + configs + validation
body: Ensure README quickstart with 3 commands; keep docs/architecture.md, docs/configurations.md, docs/validation.md accurate.
